website_summaries.verdict: It's a good option if you like the idea of a reel and hose in one, but keep the limited hose length and retraction issues in mind before you make your purchase.
pros: A revamped model with a sturdier design than earlier versions
Has a retractable reel and 65-inch hose with sturdy eight-spray pattern nozzle
Reel is easy to mount and has a convenient handle when using it detached from the unit
cons: Not as versatile as other models
You are limited to the 65 feet of built-in hose
Some issues with malfunctioning of the retraction mechanism

customer_reviews.title: Excellent idea, poorly executed and cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: A plastic piece broke internally in less than 3 months with minimal use and It now pours water out. Excellent idea, poorly executed and cheaply built. I will be looking for a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I bought this hose real and it worked great for a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose real and it worked great for a month. Then inside the real it started leaking. So I sent it back. The company replaced it and 3 months later it did the same thing. Now I'm out of warranty. The company will not help me since its been longer then 30 days. Horrible product for only owning something for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chrisco

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GOOD IF USED CORRECTLY.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this hose reel due to the mixed reviews about it, but so far this has performed very well. I think the problem most people have had with this, is the rolling back of the hose. The best way to avoid roll back issues, is to let it rewind back to the unit slow, holding slight tension on the hose until it gets fully rewound. It may also be best, not to fully extend the hose, leaving a few feet remaining on the reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose holder
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and does as advertised. Easy to mount in about ten minutes. Seems to be a quality made product. I had became tired with the stand alone holders and the way they slide around when In use. All of the negative reviews dealt with the retractable device failing at some point. I purchased the extended warranty for $6 which has taken away that concern(4 yr ext warranty). If any negative issues arise, I will update. Getting the warranty was a must and may not have bought without it.
customer_reviews.author: j rocket

customer_reviews.title: Had to change to one star, I guess you should at least wait 3 month to post reviews
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these, both leak on the same place, of course three months later who is going to take responsibility for this? I can see other people have same issue. I opened both of them, and replaced o rings and even placed two, it help for a couple of moths but now they are both leaking again. There is a design problem here. Now I need to replace them will look for other brands.
customer_reviews.author: FEB

customer_reviews.title: 3 months you'll need an new one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit and after 3 months the spring broke and it would not recoil. The company replaces it and 4 months later the same issue. I am only reeling out 1⁄2 of the total hose and the unit is in a covered area not exposed to rain or sun. I believe the company does not have a viable product and should take it off the market.
customer_reviews.author: Solardell

customer_reviews.title: No more fighting with hanging up the hose
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. They work well but you don't want to pull the hose out to the max. That would just hyper extend the springs that make this work so well. When winter comes, take this unit off the wall and bring it inside the garage. If the hose freezes and breaks, you have destroyed the whole unit.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holiday

customer_reviews.title: FLO-MASTER HOSE REEL DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: YES, WHEN WORKING IT IS HANDY TO HAVE YOUR GARDEN HOSE AUTO RETRACTED. BUT, FROM THE DAY YOU START USING THIS REEL PROBLEMS ARE ON THE WAY. WITHIN A FEW MONTHS OUR REEL STARTED TO LEAK INTERNALLY. I CALLED FLO-MASTER, HAD TO PAY FOR SHIPPING $35. THE NEW UNIT LASTED LESS THAN 3 MONTHS. AT THAT POINT IT STARTED TO LEAK INTERNALLY. I CUT THE FEED HOSE AND INSTALLED A WATER SHUT OFF VALVE TO SOLVE THE LEAK PROBLEM. A WEEK LATER THE HOSE REEL NO LONGER RETRACTS AND IS USELESS.......MY ADVISE, BUY A HAND CRANKED HOSE REEL SLIGHTLY MORE EFFORT BUT A LOT LESS HEADACHES.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Storti

customer_reviews.title: Ready To Junk It
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering this for "desired length" and "locking stop" you will likely be very disappointed if your experience is anything like mine. The good part is that it does fully retract your hose if you first simply relieve it of any pressure. The bad part is that the locking stop does not stay stopped. It will randomly retract your hose when you think you had stopped it at your desired length. It is so annoying and happens so frequently that I am considering removing it from the very nice post that I set in concrete and painted, then taking it to my local dump.
customer_reviews.author: Perot

customer_reviews.title: Great for the backyard enthusiast and gardner.
customer_reviews.text: There are several pros to this item, but it has a serious con. We now have returned one due to the fact that the retractable hose had developed bubbles under the outer surface which eventually burst causing water to constantly squirt from the holes in the hose. We returned the first one which was exchanged for another one, but again the new one has again developed the bubbles in the same area the first one did and now they too have burst squirting water from the holes caused by the bubbles, and now the unit is out of warranty and we can not locate the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this hose, it is reasonably priced (for a 65' hose and plastic housing), but our unit started leaking rusty water from inside after about 5 months. Manufacturer was quick to respond to a warranty request but they ask for $38 shipping to send a replacement - over half the cost of a new unit. Assuming the new one will last about the same I'd be paying for more than an entire unit every year. Plus dealing with the rust stain on everything that was under the unit. If they could up the quality of the build, this would be a 5 star item but crappy quality can't be overcome by other merits.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moore

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I ALWAYS KNEW THE FLO-MASTER WAS A VERY WELL MADE PRODUCT SINCE I HAVE BOUGHT 4 IN THE LAST 15 YEARS DUE TO MY WIFES EXPANDING GARDEN WITH THE FIRST 3 STILL WORKING GREAT. BUT THE FOURTH ONE HAD A VERY SMALL LEAK SO FOR THE FIRST TIME I HAD TO CALL CUSTOMER SERVICE. WELL DUE TO THERESA AND THEIR STAFF ADDRESSING MY PROBLEM ON MY FIRST EMAIL I AM 5110 PERCENT SURE I MADE A GREAT DECISION TO PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT. IN ALL MY YEARS AS A CONSUMER I HAVE NEVER RECIEVED BETTER OR FASTER CUSTOMER SERVICE. THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING, YOU ARE A GREAT AMERICAN COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: joeb3875

customer_reviews.title: Defective Flo-Master
customer_reviews.text: Morning all. I purchased a total of 5 of these home reels. The first 1 failed in about 3 months. So I purchased a replacement for it. So now about 16 months later the other 4 its have all failed. First they stared discharging a amount of rusty water. So I learned just to let them flush out. Not very good when filling the pool or washing down the boat. BUT then they all stopped retracting the host that was pulled out. The results of all of this they have all been put out with he trash. FYI don't even think about buying them
customer_reviews.author: WayneO

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these for different areas of our house - 1 lasted about a month and a replacement was provided by the manufacturer, 2 of them lasted exactly 13 months and were rejected for any repair by the manufacturer (only has 12 month warranty), and 1 is still working. All 3 failures (75% failure rate) stopped retracting and leave variable amounts of hose that won't be coiled so leave a loose sloppy mess, which we got have obtained with a $10 hose if that was what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: PITflyer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this product due to some of the negative reviews. It has worked flawlessly and I'm glad I bought it. If you don't yank it around and walk it back into the carriage it works just fine. I've not had any problems with mine. You pull the hose out and then give it a small tug to engage the stop so it does not retract. After use, give it a small tug and it releases the stop and you can walk it back to the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: David Waters

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged for shipment~~
customer_reviews.text: We liked the feature extending to 65 feet and a return hose assistance sealed housing to the housing. The only big fault is that it had a huge leak from the day we returned the product. We could not repair the product, consequently we had to finally get into the housing and discovered the entire internal totally demolished. Very poor packaged for shipment. The consumer eats it again........
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews more carefully. It lasted one summer. When I pulled the hose out for the first watering of spring I heard crunching inside. I'm assuming that was the plastic gears for the retractor crumbling. It never rewound Again. It's completely useless now because you can't even roll up the hose manually . I didn't bother with customer service based on what I've read in the reviews. I don't want to spend money to ship it back just to take a chance on installing another one that will most likely break again. Very disappointed with my decision to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk, lasts until just after the waranty runs out.
customer_reviews.text: I will not waste my money on this again. At just over a year, the internal water containing shaft broke in half. All plastic. The outside was starting to dry rot and crack apart, too. We just threw it away, and will not replace, especially since the price has gone up, too. Wish they made something similar, all metal.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B.

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this years ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely dread dealing with a hose and reel. Most hoses are a pain to use, but this one is awesome. I liked it so much I ended up buying one for the front and back yards. You do have to anchor it to something, otherwise when you pull it, you will just drag it or topple it. Luckily my husband is handy and anchored it for me. My daughter in law has one and put it on a post, so it at chest level. That is ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Alex P

customer_reviews.title: Retracting mechanism stops working
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Flo-Master retractable hose in two years. I like the concept of this type of hose since I have back problems. Each time it stopped retracting after a few months of use and I only use it to water my plants. After the first one stopped working, I thought maybe it was defective or I was too rough so I ordered another one. This one lasted a little longer but a few days ago it broke, too and I’ll have to go back to the manual crank style.
customer_reviews.author: SilviaBC

customer_reviews.title: Dubious support
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it's fantastic and really can be an asset worth having. We have two of these units.....unfortunately, one was fully retracted and it is impossible to get the retraction device to operate. It progressively worsened to this level. We tried to find any online videos or help regarding possible resetting procedures but could never find any answers. We drove to retailers listing the product and no one knew any answers either. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Ken jones

customer_reviews.title: Did Even Last A Year / Flo-Master Started  Dripping The First Week / Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Flo-Master is a terrible product. The Flo-Master started dripping the first week and the internal spring started to slow down after 3 months and finally the spring sprung out 8 months later. The hose is useless now piled up on my deck. To bad it is not designed so you could re-tighten the inside spring from one of the outside two panels. There are two major design flaws with this retractable hose: 1) the hose leaks inside contanstanly & 2) the spring inside that retracts the hose is weak and is easy to spring out from it's inside clips which cannot be tighten; Do Not Buy! Total Garbage!
customer_reviews.author: W. Glass

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This hose real stopped retracting within 3 weeks of purchase. It is a piece of junk and now in the trash. I had previously purchased a "Hoselink" brand that still works awesome 2 years later and needed another one for the back yard. The cost for the Hoselink was $150.00 so I thought I would save a few bucks and get this one (half the price) as it looked very similar. BIG MISTAKE. Spend the money and get the Hoselink.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: No more hoses laying in the yard!
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install on the side of our pump house, and it works great to easily pull out the hose and lock into position anywhere. When you're done, you just give it a light tug and it pulls the whole hose back inside within 5 seconds. The only real issue we have is that the hose is thin and kinks easily so it's not something you can drag around the yard like those no-kink hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I bought two of these units. Both were relatively easy installations (for a handyman), and both work great, just as advertised. Would've given 5 stars, but one of the spray nozzles leaks from the handle (not from where it meets the hose, but from the handle itself). Really like the looks and the utility of these units. One other minor detractor: there are no covers for the exposed expansive bolts (hope they don't rust!).
customer_reviews.author: Dufferbill

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Good thing I bought the warranty when they offered it. Worked great for a while but hose stopped retracting after about a year of use. Believe the inner spring mechanism broke. I opened it to see if it was a simple fix, but that turned out to be a bad idea. Because the mounting bracket was so hard to drill into my stucco wall, I don’t want to try another brand. So I’m contemplating buying a replacement but really hesitant to because it’s probably going to break again after a limited time. Also no easy way of contacting the manufacturer for support. Roll of the dice it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan E.

customer_reviews.title: Super efficient and reliable
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked great for me. Mounted it on a 6x6 under on my patio. Retracts really good and even every time. I keep mine out of the sun at all times as is recommended. Only had this for about 3 months hoping it last several years. This hose makes watering the yard So easy and efficient when you don’t have to spend 10 minutes wrapping a hose up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and doesn't retract well.
customer_reviews.text: Product was was easy to install and swivels well. However, it started leaking from the bottom of the housing, alot, within a month of purchase which causes waste and a serious drop in water pressure. Also, the hose doesn't retract as well as the other model I own. The retraction is hard to trigger, and the hose often has to be gradually pushed back into its housing once it's within about 8 feet of being completely reeled.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in installation
customer_reviews.text: Was happy when opening the package that the reel was nearly entirely assembled, which was great. Frankly, wasn't inspecting that. First problem was that if mounting the bracket to wood (like a post or wood structure) it requires lag screws which are not included. A couple of dollars for some lag screws would have been much appreciated. Now, I need to drive to the hardware store for screws. Second, the mounting bracket does NOT fit on a standard "4X4" pressure treated post (at least in the U.S.). Since this is likely a pretty common way of installing it, it is very disappointing that it doesn't fit. Now I will need to fashion some other way of installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and worth the purchase...
customer_reviews.text: The retractable feature is a major plus. Easy to put together, but difficult to install. Other downside is the nozzle that comes with it is weak, but easy fix, however if your watering plants, then it’s perfect for you. This product is very heavy due to the hose inside so be cautious when mounting. After mounting, enjoy the design and usefulness of this product. One good tug and watch it retract, making it well worth the purchase and hassle free hose pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Leak
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these hoses that I purchased in 2016 and it has worked well. However, this time the hose reel leaked from inside the unit while in use. I returned the first one, and the second one leaked as well. I can’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Hose always retracts.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife to for auto retraction, she waters daily. She said it doesn't stop, always retracts. I got it to work once, never again, tried numerous things, pressurized, drained, slow pulls and fast, pulled out a short amount or all the hose, nothing would stop the retraction. It retracts nice...just with it would stop.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Golden

customer_reviews.title: great product breaks after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this hose reel is that after 1 year of extremely light use and proper draining and storing in winter, both of the hose reels i bought broke within 2 weeks of each other. I thought the first one was just a fluke. I contacted the company and never heard back. Then the second one broke... i loved the product but I have to leave a bad review because I either got two defective units or they only last a year before they stop self retracting. Now I am stuck with 8 holes in the side of my brick house and only 1 product that will fit there... wish they would just send me replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Eldred

customer_reviews.title: Solid hose reel
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star but occasionally the retracting feature isn't that smooth and it sometimes gets caught and I have to pull the hose out and start over. This hasn't happened every time but enough that it makes me go with a 5 star. It's big and bulky so be sure you have the space for it. The 65 foot hose is a good distance. Overall a solid product that I recommend if you're looking for a retractable hose reel.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Mason Clark

customer_reviews.title: Too Good to be True.
customer_reviews.text: I installed three of these Memorial Day weekend and we haven’t even gotten to Labor Day. Too good to be true. One is leaking from within the reel mechanism and yesterday with a second unit the threaded end of the hose blew off while watering with the nozzle. Just FYI, I have a new pressure valve on my house and installed three of these so that I wouldn’t have to exert undue stress on each of the hoses. I was planning haven’t these for years to come. I took great care using them. Maybe just poorly made??? I would love to hear from amazon or manufacturer. I’ll update S needed.
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Seems Ok, But read Review
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time, box not damaged. The product installed ok, not sure how long it will hold up as it has only been installed a couple days. If you buy this, do yourself a favor and by a new Sprayer. The one that was sent is cheap plastic and was broken after 5 minutes of use, could not even shut it off. Over all the convenience of the unit is good. We shall see how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Helm

customer_reviews.title: Great product while it worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in June 2017. It worked really well through the first 2 summers so a month or so ago I bought another one for the front of the house. This evening the original one stopped retracting. I know it’s been just over 2 years, but for a product that costs almost a hundred dollars, I expected it to be functional much longer than that. It’s garbage now and I’m regretting buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hose reel to replace one we purchased from a specialty catalog over 7 years ago. We loved our old one... and love this one as well. Seems to be very well constructed and the retraction is great. Well... a little too good for me. It is a very strong return pull. It is my only minor complaint. Sometimes if I am not paying attention and I pull it to retract... it will pull me off balance. So be aware! We also like that this hose dimension is larger than our previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Knoxwell

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my garden water hose because my hose was always in the middle of the yard. The sun, heat, and outdoor elements were destroying it. I didn't have time or the will to put it back in its rack. Then I found this retractable hose! I really enjoy watering my plants and just letting it roll itself. So far it has been the best purchase I've made. Hope it lasts. I will update my review if needed.
customer_reviews.author: cora

customer_reviews.title: Hose developed pin holes throughout it after a year in a protected environment
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 8 months and then started developing bubbles in the hose. Those bubbles eventually popped, revealing pin holes that are now spraying water everywhere. This was in a protected setting under cover out of the elements and sun. I never left it pressurized when it wasn't being used and sprayed all the pressurized water out of it after every use before letting it retract.
customer_reviews.author: Taylormade

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is a good retractable hose that performs as advertised. The retracting mechanism works very well as long as you walk it back in and not just let it go. Then installation is generally pretty easy unless one person is trying to hang it on the bracket by themselves. Because of the weight it would go much better with 2 people. overall I consider this a good product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Killen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very plasticky. The hoses were of very poor quality and look like they're about to have a kink in them already. Mine came with some hard water spots on the mounting bracket. Looks like it was used, but no other signs of usage. Even though the video shows it mounting onto a 4X4 wooden pole, this does not come with lag bolts. I'm returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: It's well made and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! No more tangled hoses, no more dirty hose rubbing on mypants/legs, & no more time spent rolling it back up (as opposed to leaving it trailing across the patio & lawn). The auto reel is the bomb and it is very sturdily made. I am buying one for the front yard next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sharalyn Perkes

customer_reviews.title: Not even one season - doesn't retract anymore
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed because I hired a handyman to install this by drilling into our brick. It worked great for maybe 6 months of only very occasional use. Now it won't retract fully which makes it basically useless. I'll be removing it from our wall and getting one of those hideaway bins instead.
customer_reviews.author: tgr74

customer_reviews.title: the spring sprung in a few months
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this. It was was exactly what I wanted but it did not last 3 months. I called the manufacture and they replaced it but I treat the second one very gingerly in order to not mess up the spring. I am afraid to pull the hose all the way out, which makes it about useless.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: It's not true 5/8 hose...
customer_reviews.text: 2 issues after 5 years... The nozzle began leaking last year... The other thing is, sure the hose is 5/8 but the inside diameter is like 1/4 or 3/8. Horrible! That's hardly enough. I think things need to be measure on the inside as only that can be the true measument. Like shoes for feet...
customer_reviews.author: AZ540

customer_reviews.title: Not bad,,,, not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap... seems to work ok though. The smaller hose diameter definitely decreases the water pressure! I would buy a standard size hose, if I bought another similar product. Install wasn’t easy on a house with masonite siding. I used a pressure treated 2x6” mounted to my house and installed the hose reel to it, using the included fasters, without the spreading sleeves. Just depends on how much water pressure you need........... may be great for gardening, not so great for cleaning mud from a driveway........
customer_reviews.author: Travis Lee

customer_reviews.title: Neat and tidy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It keeps my hose nice and neat. It does exactly what it was advertised to do. Be cautious not to pull the hose out too far. There is a mark to stop extending the hose, use it. Otherwise it’s a little difficult to get the hose to retract. The hose is superlong, which fits my needs. I have a very large yard. It didn’t come with the lag bolts that I wished it would have. I love how it retracts neatly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: LMo

customer_reviews.title: Bad screw designs! Cheap plastic and hose
customer_reviews.text: I’m very handy with the tool, but I spend a good hour just putting for screws on the wall, I had to use the assistance of my wife and extra tools to get it done. It looks easy but when installing is frustrating. My wall has cinderblock so the screen that come inside of felt inside and couldn’t retrieve it. Definitely bad design and the plastic looks good but feels cheap. I bought 3 of them. I will return all 3
customer_reviews.author: franz collier

customer_reviews.title: Many great features
customer_reviews.text: I've had my hose reel for a year now and could not be more pleased. It retracts consistently and easily. It seems durable and being able to carry it indoors easily for winter should help it last for a long time. I did crack the nozzle by repeatedly dropping it (my bad!) but the nozzle still works.
customer_reviews.author: Yowza

customer_reviews.title: Retractable Hose Reel
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but nozzle that came with hose reel , it is cheaply made. Leaked right out of box. You need to work on the nozzle - it is poor design and quality. First nozzle broke (this is the second reel I bought) after a while and second one leaked right out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Don't use with a pressure washer as the back pulse can damage the rotating internal connection.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Stanley version of this hose reel and it lasted 3 years until the internal rotating fitting failed after I used the hose with my 3000psi pressure washer. Also, the plastic does not stand up continuous exposure to sun light, it literally turns gummy and can be scratched off like fondant. Despite these issues I bought 3 of these units but this time I use small outdoor covers to protect the housing and I no longer use it with a pressure washer. Hopefully they will last even longer than the Stanley version.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Joe Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  No More Tangled Hoses!
customer_reviews.text: I've been surprised. This has been one of my Top 10 items to add at my home. Sturdy and well built. Perfect for the outdoor faucet area. I truly will have one of these at every place at the house that offers water. It's really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Product Crushed in Shipping
customer_reviews.text: The hose end (where the sprayer is attached) was crushed in shipping. If I had noticed this before the unit was installed I would have returned it for a replacement. It's now way too much trouble to take it off the mounting and returning it. If you order this, open the box right away and check all parts and connections. I wish we had done that.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Gal

customer_reviews.title: Leaking inside housing after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2020 and in August I found it leaking inside and started dripping water when I have the water one. Not sure what’s going but I use about 1 time a week and would shut down and drain the water inside the hose after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than a year with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted, but I only used it maybe 3-4 times a week and its already trash. It stopped retracting and then within a few days the outer skin/liner of the hose started separating from being in the sun. The next week it started blistering and springing leaks where the skin separated. BEWARE, this hose is only good if kept out of the sun and that can depend on being retractable which seems to fail.
customer_reviews.author: Krisocrat

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I found this unit easy to install on my Brick wall and it works perfectly. The hose fittings are super tough brass and should last a long time. It was a purchase I am really pleased with and I will probably order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT WORK FOR LONG.
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one I purchased arrived broken. I sent it back and, against my better judgement I purchased a 2nd in April of this year (2019). It took me about a month to find the time to install it (I mounted it on an exterior brick wall which irritates me even more knowing I defaced one of my walls for nothing). So it was installed in late May 2019 and I used around my pool area. While it worked I loved it. And then I came outside today, pulled about 15' out and the tension went limp. It won't retract and it has no other way to draw in the hose. It lasted only 3 months. What crap!
customer_reviews.author: C Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Great product until the spring broke
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 18 months and the retractor quit working. It was a great product while it worked, but didn’t last very long. It is installed in a covered patio so the sun did not damage it at all. I used it about once a week for 18 months before the spring gave out. Other than that, no issues with leaking or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Spring return quit working about a year after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Unit nozzle broke within a month of purchase. Mfg sent a replacement promptly (Good Service !!!). Spring return failed roughly a year after purchase [No longer retracts hose]. Will attempt to take apart and repair. Will update accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: GJS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Unit
customer_reviews.text: Terrific unit, I've had one for almost 10 years bought the exact same model again didn't even have to use the mounting bracket because they're identical. delivery was pretty quick and the unit is very nice oh, I would buy it again and again
customer_reviews.author: RickB

customer_reviews.title: Bad full of holes
customer_reviews.text: Hose start dripping form the center after couple uses , worth 1 /8 of the price for the junk quality . Even Amazon customer rep Priya decided on my behalf and the system that allowd a replacement no to do replacement coz I should not give this product a try again.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Leaking like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and one of them works fine with now leaks. The other one leaked after 2 months of use. I've tried contacting the manufacturer and visited the their website rlflowmaster.com which takes you to another website called Hudson. This has been the most excruciating process that I've ever been through trying to get my hose replaced or fixed. Customers service is extremely horrible so I wouldn't suggest buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA TECHEIRA

customer_reviews.title: It works as adverised
customer_reviews.text: It really is a good product. HOWEVER, it lack two things that keep it from being a great product: 2 VERY SMALL things: The Lead-in hose does not have "bend-protection," like a spring or sleeve at the spigot so it bends and shuts off water flow to the main body AND the nuts that came with it are not anodized so they rust easily. Come on! This is an outdoor product that gets wet easily. Two very simple improvement for which I'd pay $10 more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped retracting in 5 months!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 5 months and it stopped retracting all of a sudden. Like others have said, once it stops working there is no way to fix it. I opened it and saw that the insides were taped and possible a faulty system was re-packaged and sold as new. For the price paid, I had hoped it would last longer than 5 months. I WOULD STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amit L

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this thing...Mounting bracket bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: So handy to use. But if you're gonna put it on a 4X4 post - predrill the holes. The mounting bracket is larger than expected. Which is good and bad. Some reviews said that it easily mounts on a 4x4 post - maybe mine are smaller? But I mounted a 2X6 inbetween two 4x4 posts that were close to where I wanted the reel. All good from there.
customer_reviews.author: Troy K.

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought a total of 4 units after a year use,they end up in the garbage. The retraction mechanism just decides to give up after a while. I could understand one unit going bad, but 3 out of 4 is incomprehensible
customer_reviews.author: PRIVATE

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Really good size hose for general purpose use. NOT low pressure like a little half inch hose I replaced. Strong spring for returning the hose for storage. Give it a tug when finished and hang on to it if you don't want it to slam back in place. I always keep the water pressure turned on when rewinding so it doesn't collapse. That makes it easier to pull out without kinking it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike7763

customer_reviews.title: Bad Nozzles
customer_reviews.text: Easy to intalll, looks great and easy to use. But I bought two and both of the handles give you a shower when you use it. Water spouts off everywhere from one of the seams in the handle itself. I would ask to have them replaced but since 2 out 2 don't work, looks like I'll have to buy some elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I gave up and nver used it, installing it on a brick wall for me, anyway, was too difficult
customer_reviews.text: It seems nice, but I found a better solution for my situation, a hose that is tiny when not running with water, and thus is far less bulky than this one,and they space I had for this one was quite limited,. So it was a bit too large for me as well as heavy and hard to install on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D Boozer

customer_reviews.title: retractible part works nice but hose not best quality
customer_reviews.text: Mounting was easy and it works well but the hose is not the best quality. Nevertheless, it does the job and retracts pretty easy. Just make sure you hold onto the hose and let it retract slowly. I just hope it lasts. If there is a problem, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ewiz

customer_reviews.title: Light duty hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Returned a cheaper one to get this one. Had it installed on the wall before I noticed some broken pieces still in the box. Then found they were the side center piece and cover the hose wheel turns on. No damage to the box. Plastic is thin and would not hold up more than a year if it was not broken. Returned it. Not trying three times.
customer_reviews.author: James A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one.. I put one in the back yard and it has had no issue over that last 7 years.. I bought one for the front for making car washes and yard work a breeze.. Its smartest to turn off water pressure before you retract it... I do think this stops the mechanism from damage over the long hall..
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hookup
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and liked it so much I bought another. Skeptical though as I live 2 blocks from the ocean in Hawaii and salt air is a problem. Had them a few months now and work just great. Their nozzles are starting to rust though.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lum

customer_reviews.title: Great long garden hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Great garden hose reel. STRONG return spring makes retracting and storing the hose easy. The winding mechanism keeps the pipe aligned properly inside the reel. Really happy with it use it with a pressure washer fed off a garden hose pump drawing filtrated water and it has no problem with 40-60 psi.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: it's no longer retractable after extractly one year
customer_reviews.text: It was great when I first installed it, everything works great, but then after few months, it started to drip water but it's not a big deal, however, it recently not be able to retract after use right after the one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: clark

customer_reviews.title: watering has never been easier
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Yeah, my old hose hanging off he wall worked too. But I noticed that it was a b**ch to use and rarely got to be used. This thing is not cheap but it works great and watering/washing has never been as easy. Things magically get done now ;) Keep in mind that you will want to hang it with either to provided bolts or some other heavy-duty means. When this thing fills with water, it weights a tons and will come off the wall right out. BTW, remember to let it coil with the faucet open to allow water to drain and ease the internal tension.
customer_reviews.author: Kklebicki

customer_reviews.title: Very short life span...
customer_reviews.text: Hose system was relatively easy to install and it worked well for the first few months. after about 4-5 months the roller started to malfunction and not close all the way. now about 1 month ago it just gave up and wont roll back at all. the problem is there is no way / no contact information on how to contact the manufacturer/seller to see how this can be resolved so now im just with a expensive and non functioning junk on my backyard wall
customer_reviews.author: BIZ

customer_reviews.title: Hose has blisters forming and leaking from those areas.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th hose reel that I've purchased of this brand and model. We have slowly added them to all the spigots around our home. This is the newest one that I'm having trouble with. We are outside the Amazon 30 day window so I have reached out to the Company for support. I will follow up on this review once I have feedback from Hudson. 8/11 UPDATE I received a replacement from the manufacturer with no fuss! The new unit is working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Broke in two years and cant be fixed
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted less than two years before it would retract only half way. I tried all the tricks like laying it on the right side but nothing worked. I took it apart but it's unserviceable. The spring that needs to retensioned is inside the house reel itself and there was no readily apparent way to access it or retension it. Not surprising for such a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Marshall

customer_reviews.title: THREE failed within a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought three units (for: side/rear/garage), and they failed in a year. Including the one I placed inside my garage where no direct sun light or extreme temperature. All three unites started failed in retracting in certain length (like ~20ft+), then it's getting worse and worse. Please note that there was no tangle in the hose. Other than that, two of the units had minor water dripping from the housing and some sort of brown oil from the triangle side cover. I like this when it's working!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: The hose reel work very well. The rotating reel helps to keep the hose from binding. Rewinding is fast and easy. My only wish is for better durability. Mine last about 5-6 years. I'd like one built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Great hose reel
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement to one we purchased from Frontgate about 8 years ago. We left it out over winter (lazy) and some of the inner pieces broke while it sat out. I think this one is better than the first one we had. The hose coil is smoother and it even came with a multifunction removable spout. And best of all it fit in the mount that we had installed for our old unit!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Working great for over a year.
customer_reviews.text: Working great since April 2018. Good pressure, the hose goes out and comes in good. It was easy to mount. I see some negative comments and that has not been my experience. It’s a great price and good quality. I just put it on again after storing in the cellar for the winter. I am buying a second one to use on the back of my garage!
customer_reviews.author: BostonKevin

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle leaked badly out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The spray nozzle that comes with this leaks quite profusely from between the (plastic) chrome part and the green part where it connects to the hose. Other than that the rest of the unit seems find so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Will not retract back in after 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these I didn’t install them the first year I had them Then I put one out last summer and the first one broke after about 10 times pulling the hose out would not go back in. Some greasy s try if started to come out of it so this year I got the second one out and then low and behold started to see the same greasy stuff and now won’t go back in on to the third one we will see For the money I payed they should last a few summers If anyone from the company wants to talk please let me know
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install. Just attach the bracket to a flat surface. I had to use 4 lag bolts. Once the bracket is attached, the hose reel slides on. The reel is fairly large so make sure you have enough clearance. I love that you can swing it left and right. The reel retracts easily, it comes with the hose and a sprayer. I loved this reel so much, I bought two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Angie in SC

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Have a large yard and lots of watering to do. Makes it sooo easy. No winding or guiding, it just rolls back in as you would want it to. Was given first one as a gift and bought one for my front yard too. Time save and zero aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I found this item on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this item on Amazon. It makes using the hose super efficient. I like everything about the design and operation of the unit. My only recommendation to the company and warning to prospective buyers is it includes a cheap and fragile nozzle as a bonus that takes away from the overall product and will likely break just by screwing it into the hose. The manufacturer should save the expense of including the nozzle. The unit is a great value without it.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Retractable Mechanism malfunction
customer_reviews.text: The lure of this product is the retractable hose, which worked properly for about 6 months. After 6 months of use, it needed the hose to lay flat on the ground for it to be reeled back in. Next, I had to remove the water pressure for it to completely reel the hose. The latest, it flat out refuses to reel in the last 6 to 10 feet of the hose. I live in a new community with a lot of new homeowners, I am probably not recommending this to my neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Anand

customer_reviews.title: Had Two, Each Broke in a Year,
customer_reviews.text: I have had two in three years. The retraction assembly breaks. It doesn't matter how carefully you use the hose reel, following all warnings, it is simply not a viable design. Works well at first, which is the allure. Heavy, hard to ship, expensive to return even if somebody would take a broken on back, not repairable by any handyman. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PULL IT TO THE END!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed since I bought 2 of them. On day 1 after I installed it I pulled the hose out to water the garden and once I got close to where I thought I should have seen the white tape the instructions explained not to pull past it stopped. Never did see any marking or tape. It took about 15 minutes but I did manage to get it to retract in. Now 2 months later my wife pulled the hose out and again it is all the way out and I can't get it to retract. I have not even taken the 2nd one out of the box yet. Hope this helps someone else make an informed decision.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great hose, terrible hardware provided
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great! The retractable hose works exactly as I had hoped. The only thing keeping me from leaving 5 stars was the hardware they provide... there’s no instructions on how to properly install whatever it is they give you.. no way that nut fits on a bolt that will be screwed into a wall. I actually went and purchased 4 tapcon screws to install onto a stucco exterior. Other than the provided hardware and lack of instructions, this product is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up, easy to use. Way better than manually rolling up the hose every time we use it. Seems to lock in place well and retract well. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sportslover

customer_reviews.title: Broke within months with only light use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace one that had simply worn out after years of use. Chose this one because It looked similar to our old one. The hose would no longer retract into the reel house after around 4 months of light use. We now have a $90 dollar pile of hose that is prone to kinking, is heavy and unwieldy. Do Not Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: Was great for 3 months.....
customer_reviews.text: The item seemed well built and worked great for a few months, then the reel wouldn't rewind itself, this was for basic home use inside a garage. Now the hose will not go back inside the housing and I have 20' of extra hose laying on the floor. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Carson

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: I liked this hose reel and it worked quite well. It did however just break just over 2 years later. The hose will no longer retract. We use it maybe daily for about 3 months of the year and it is mounted to the house under a covered patio and not exposed directly to the elements. Disappointing quality in the retractable mechanism to fail so quickly. Cannot recommend to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Adams

customer_reviews.title: does as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the shop and it is so nice to have the hose when I need it but out of the way when I don't. Goes on the wall easy and is very good quality. great that it comes with the hose included and already on the reel. Ones at the big box store was just as much money but had no hose included. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: I buy too much from Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Beware of limited warranty - year
customer_reviews.text: no longer retracted after 18 months. Called the company after trying their manual processes, they said, "Oh well, it's out of warranty. There is nothing we can do."
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A hose reel that looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Need the right tools to install, but pretty easy. Good roll out & rollup. Looks good on wall. Only complaint is the long hollow pin used to attach to wall bracket. Starting to rust a little and difficult to remove if only one person doing it. Sprayed it with WD40 which helped.. overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RL Flo-Master 65HR8 Retractable Hose Reel, 65 Feet, Brown
product_meta.description:
The 65HR8 Retractable hose reel has 65" Of reinforced hose, a brass hose Fitting, an pattern spray nozzle, & has a convenient carrying handle. The heavy duty spring inside the unit provides a smooth return, while the guide prevents the hose from overlapping. The hose reel can be easily removed for winter storage. (Mounting hardware is included).

For customer service call: 1-800-253-4642

flo-master's commitment to quality goes far beyond the excellent sprayer you buy!
feature_bullets: Slow, Retractable spring-loaded hose with stopper
The automatic guide prevents the hose from overlapping while retracting.
The mounting brackets allow for a 180 Degree swivel; mounting hardware is included.
This Unit can be removed from the bracket and includes a carrying handle.
65' Of reinforced 5/8" Hose with a threaded brass end is included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,328 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
